 Barack Hussein Obama is fighting to hide his real stance on gun control. Joe Biden and Barack Hussein Obama will disarm you first. Then the government will have complete control over the populace.
 
 Be careful what you vote for. Obama is a sly politician and truly hates the fact that we are free to own guns and ammunition. He'll smile and say he's for you, while he plans to take your freedoms away...one at a time. He's a Marxist in a nice suit...pretending to be a representative of the people when all he truly represents is a grab for power and complete control. As long as he and his family of cronies are among the ruling few, they'll be no true freedoms for the masses...except to pay taxes and watch government annoucements on the MSM channels.

The belief that nobody needs to be armed because being the victim of a violent crime is too remote to justify an armed response, it what puts others at risk, because it's these people with these opinions that're usually in a position of authority.
I didn't say nobody, I said I choose for myself not to be armed. Just respect my right to choose.

Omegamon_X

IMO advocating the arming of the average citizen in public is a societal step backwards.

 I don't consider being able to defend yourself to be a step backwards, it's a step forward. Continuing to be a stupid sheep and believing "I'll be alright, the police are going to protect me, that's what they're there for" is a step backwards in development and a sign of stupidity.
sinjin

How? By acknowledging the fact that the cops can't possibly be there to protect you when you need them, and that being a victim and non-violence is a non-answer to the issue at hand?
 
 I don't consider being able to defend yourself to be a step backwards, it's a step forward. Continuing to be a stupid sheep and believing "I'll be alright, the police are going to protect me, that's what they're there for" is a step backwards in development and a sign of stupidity.

I didn't say nobody, I said I choose for myself not to be armed. Just respect my right to choose.

 I dont carry a fire extinguisher to a movie theater because there are these little things, maybe you have even seen one Sinjin, they are called smoke detectors, and they detect smoke so the theater can be emptied before a possible fire occurs or gets out of control. Now what we dont have at a movie theater is a killer detector, no one has any kind of pre-warning devices that let you know someone is coming to the theater to start killing people, and in case you havent noticed, the theater already places fire extenguishers throughout the building just in case of a fire. Your comparison of guns to fire-extinguishers showed a complete lack of commonsense thinking. A famous quote" God created man, but Sam Colt made him equall". If the new ammendment gave me more rights I would be happy and enjoy the new rights, but if it took away a right already in place, I would fight to have the new ammendment extinguished. Your post again shows no commonsense in your thinking, it would be like asking what a person would do if the bank tampered with his account, was money illegaly taken out of the account, or was money illegaly put in the account. Both are illegal(mistakes excluded), but one will not fight if the action benefits them.
